trans-unit.source: Specifies which properties should be reported by type descriptors, specifically the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProperties*> method.
trans-unit.target: 지정 형식 설명자, 특히 속성을 보고 해야는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProperties*>메서드.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProperties*>

trans-unit.source: The PropertyFilterAttribute [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] supports an internal mechanism that limits the number of properties on a type that are returned by the custom <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: PropertyFilterAttribute [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 형식에 사용자 지정 하 여 반환 되는 속성의 수를 제한 하는 내부 메커니즘을 지원 <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>형식 설명자.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>

trans-unit.source: If the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is found, the type descriptor narrows the scope of returned properties.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 발견 되 면 형식 설명자는 반환 된 속성의 범위를 좁힙니다.

trans-unit.source: PropertyFilterAttribute differs from typical [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattrsharpplural-md.md)] because you cannot apply it to a class as metadata.
trans-unit.target: 일반적인에서 다른 PropertyFilterAttribute [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattrsharpplural-md.md)] 하므로 메타 데이터 클래스에 적용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The filter mechanism works through code instead of through static metadata.
trans-unit.target: 필터 메커니즘은 정적 메타 데이터를 통해 대신 코드를 통해 작동합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The options that describe this property filter.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성 필터를 설명 하는 옵션입니다.

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] 인프라 하며 사용자 코드에서 직접 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 반환 하는지 여부를 현재 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"> </xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 지정 된 개체가 같은지를 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation compares the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions> values on each <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> for value equality.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현에서는 비교는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions>각 값 <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute>값 일치에 대 한.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions> are the same, then the two <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions>동일 하지만, 다음은이 두 <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute>인스턴스가 같은지.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이를 비교할 개체를 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>하는 경우 지정 된 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"> </xref> 현재 같은지 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"> </xref>, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the filter options for this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 이 대 한 필터 옵션을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"> </xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of Filter is the same value as was provided for the `filter` constructor argument when this <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> was constructed.
trans-unit.target: 필터의 값은 동일한 값에 대해 제공 된 대로 `filter` 생성자 인수 때이 <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute>만들어졌지만.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute>

trans-unit.source: There is no other means of setting the Filter value.
trans-unit.target: 필터 값을 설정할 때의 의미를 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The property filter options.
trans-unit.target: 속성 필터 옵션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 현재에 대 한 해시 코드를 반환 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"> </xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: A signed 32-bit integer value.
trans-unit.target: 부호 있는 32 비트 정수 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the property filter options of the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] match the property filter options of the provided object.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 반환 속성 필터 현재 옵션이 있는지 여부를 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"> </xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 일치 제공 된 개체의 속성 필터 옵션입니다.

trans-unit.source: For attributes that store flags, which is true for <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute>, a Match result may be different from an <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute.Equals%2A> result.
trans-unit.target: 플래그를 저장 하는 특성의 경우에 마찬가지 되 <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute>, 일치 결과 다를 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute.Equals%2A>결과.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute.Equals%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For example, a filter of <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions> matches a filter of <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions>, because <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions> is a merge of all filter values.
trans-unit.target: 필터의 예를 들어 <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions>필터와 일치할 <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions>때문에, <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions>모든 필터 값의 병합 됩니다.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 비교할 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: This object is expected to be a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 개체는 것으로 예상 되는 <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a match exists; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>일치 하는 항목이 있으면; 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.
